record.dc:title: 5-101 Irwin Village Site 11CP5, Campbell County, Tennessee. Mound 1. Feature 10, Circular stone pile.
record.wpa:narrative: A circular pile of stones about 30 in number. The material is sandstone being smooth and rounded. None of the stones have a diameter greater than three inches.
